website_summaries.verdict: A timeless theme that Star Wars fans young and old would love to have in their room.
pros: The muted colors would blend well with just about any decor

customer_reviews.title: My son adores this set!
customer_reviews.text: Best bed-in-a-bag set I have ever ordered. The quality is really great and my son goes berserk over this set. He absolutely loves it. Sheets are well made, comforter is moderately fluffy, and the prints are all crisp and clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Cool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised my 5yr old son with this set. I told him he was getting star wars bedroom blankets and he asked if "yoda, vader, lightsabers,. etc., etc" were on it.. Sure enough this set has everything he loves!! He also loves that the pillows can be flipped over to show either storm trooper or vader. From a Dad's perspective, very comfy set and definitely awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rucco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My little boy loves it, he told me it’s super comfy! He really loves the extra decorative pillow that came with.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this bed set and it fir perfect
customer_reviews.author: Texasbadboy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the look but the quality is only so so.
customer_reviews.author: happyfam

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors together
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 for my boys new Star Wars themed room. Just as pictured. Love the colors together. Comforter is very soft and boys just love. The different pillow sham and accent pillow work perfect. Material feels light weight and not heavy but sturdy. Great set all round.
customer_reviews.author: JDR

customer_reviews.title: All pieces pictured in advertisement provided
customer_reviews.text: The comforter, Star Wars pillow case, storm trooper pillow case, decorative Darth Vader square pillow, and the sheets! That made it 5 Stars for me. There was a slight spot on the white part of the Storm trooper pillow case but I can look past that. Awesome price for all it came with. Excellent surprise for my 2 1/2 year that’s obsessed with Star Wars 💙. Bought a couple Pillow Charaters and BB8 sleeping bag and my son is in Big Boy Bed Heaven!
customer_reviews.author: NATASHA SANGO

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool Bedding!!
customer_reviews.text: This bedding set was awesome and my son was so excited when he got it. I wish the sheets were a little softer, but overall a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This has just been the cutest bed clothes for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this set, he is three years old.
customer_reviews.author: Monica A. Sigler

customer_reviews.title: I hope those "AI-AI"S are ray shielded!
customer_reviews.text: Cute Bedspread. Surprisingly there is a major typo on both the comforter and pillowcase!! It says "AI-AI" right next to the AT-AT on both! Shouldn't they have had ANY Star Wars fan on Earth proofread the print before production? Otherwise, it's great... reminds me (in spirit) of the one I had as a kid in the late 70's.
customer_reviews.author: HBGLI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks as shown and love it in my son's bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very thick comforter. I'm worried my son will be too warm in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Briggman

customer_reviews.title: Soft materials and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The bed set is really perfect. The comforter and bed sheets are soft and cozy. It eve includes a decor pillow which gives it a plus. It came very nicely packed, it can bend easily, so it keep it in a closet. It was hard to find a complete bed set so this all in one was a relief.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

product_meta.title: Jay Franco Star Wars Classic Lightsaber Twin Bed in A Bag
product_meta.description: Create an exciting new look for any kid's room with this Star Wars classic lightsaber twin bed in a bag. This bright and colorful 4 piece bed set will dress up any bedroom decor. Perfect for child or toddler bedroom. Features popular characters from the movie. 100percent polyester with comfy warm polyester fill. The reversible comforter is soft and comfortable with a Star Wars character design. Complete bedding ensemble includes twin comforter, twin fitted sheet and flat sheet and one 20 inch x 30 inch standard pillow case. Easy care, machine wash cold, tumble dry low. Imported.
feature_bullets: Includes (1) microfiber comforter with poly fill, (1) fitted sheet, (1) flat sheet & (1) pillow case
Measures: comforter 66x 86, fitted sheet 39x 75, flat sheet 66x 96, standard pillow case 20x 30
Super soft microfiber makes sleeping comfy and fun
Coordinating bedding and Accessories available (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
